name: Hunted
text: Give to the Old Man Hawkeye player. Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points. If you cannot, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded, put that minion into play with you, and attach Hunted to it. Attached minion cannot be defeated. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Old Man Hawkeye → Discard Hunted.

name: Marshall Bullseye
text: Villainous. [star] Each character cannot defend against Marshall Bullseye's attacks, and they gain piercing. Damage from Marshall Bullseye's attacks cannot be reduced or avoided. (Old Man Hawkeye's nemesis minion.)

flavor: "I have waited 41 years, 7 months and 27 days for the chance to kill another super hero. Please have the courtesy not to make me wait any longer." —Marshall Bullseye
name: Worthy of Killing
text: Each minion gains +1 ATK and Villainous. If they already have Villainous, they gain an additional +2 ATK.

name: Dead to Rights
text: Forced Interrupt: When you look at this card while resolving Hawkeye's Eye for an Eye ability, deal it to yourself as a facedown encounter card. When Revealed: Marshall Bullseye activates against you. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Marshall Bullseye and reveal him.

flavor: "You're just one big, pathetic disappointment. The last Avenger's going to die alone." —Marshall Bullseye
name: Blindsided
text: When Revealed: Exhaust your identity card and shuffle the encounter deck. This card gains surge.
